2.caption_en: Slide titled "Operational Excellence" that explains how the pillar supports development, run-time workloads, and continuous improvement to deliver business value. The slide lists design principles including performing operations as code, making frequent small reversible changes, learning from operational failures, refining procedures frequently, and anticipating failure.
2.caption_ru: Slide titled "Operational Excellence" that explains how the pillar supports development, run-time workloads, and continuous improvement to deliver business value. The slide lists design principles including performing operations as code, making frequent small reversible changes, learning from operational failures, refining procedures frequently, and anticipating failure.

4.caption_en:
A teal, rounded whitepaper cover titled "Operational Excellence" with the word "Whitepaper" beneath it and a dark newspaper icon on the left; the white, underlined title text is centered on the card.

5.caption_en:
Operational Excellence — the pillar describes supporting development and running workloads effectively, gaining operational insight, and continuously improving processes to deliver business value.

{
  "artifact_type": "informational poster",
  "title": "OPERATIONAL EXCELLENCE",
  "description": "Explains the Operational Excellence pillar: supporting development and running workloads effectively, gaining operational insight, and continuously improving processes to deliver business value.",
  "full_text": "The Operational Excellence pillar includes the ability to support development and run workloads effectively, gain insight into their operation, and continuously improve supporting processes and procedures to delivery business value.",
  "call_to_action": "Operational Excellence Whitepaper",

      "text": "Operational Excellence Whitepaper"
